
### using deadlock detection for prevention  {.smaller}


* suppose you know the <i>maximum resources</i> a process could request
* make decision <em>when starting process</em> (‘‘<i>admission control</i>’’) 
<hr class="vspace" />
* ask ‘‘what if every process was waiting for maximum resources’’ 

   * including the one we're starting

* would it cause deadlock? then <em>don't let it start</em> 
<hr class="vspace" />
* called Banker's algorithm
